long_description: Keep it ready for your next adventure: The Patagonia Fuego 32L backpack stashes all your essentials for a day trip. 3 compartments accommodate a ton of gear while keeping everything organized. Large main compartment holds most of your gear, and features a padded laptop sleeve that accommodates laptops up to 15 in.; sleeve secures with a buckle closure. Sleeve also fits a hydration reservoir (not included) for the trail and features a tube port for easy access. Zippered pocket has an organizer panel to keep pens, electronics, keys and other small items secure. Exterior zippered stash pocket is perfect for stowing essential items. Airflow-mesh shoulder straps and back panel prevent overheating; webbing hipbelt and sternum strap with emergency whistle keep pack close to body. Side compression straps ensure a jostle-free carry. The Patagonia Fuego pack features stretch-mesh side pockets for stashing water bottles. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline). Closeout.
short_description: Keep it ready for your next adventure: The Patagonia Fuego 32L backpack stashes all your essentials for a day trip.
